overview_of_class: Situated between music and the visual arts, and employing technologies both new and old, sound art is a difficult to define field that is nonetheless steadily climbing into the public consciousness.  This course will serve as an introduction to the concepts and techniques central to sound art practice today, through discussion of readings, technical topics, and examinations of several important artworks in the field. Students will complete a sound art work of their own as a final project.
name: Topics in Sound
subject: RTVF
